hits.definition:
别 (F 別, 彆)

[bié] separate, other, don't, leave, differentiate, <family name>

[biè] 别扭 bièniu awkward

处 (F 處)

[chù] place, part, point, department, office

[chǔ] deal with, get along with somebody

{Compare with 外 wài outside}

场 (F 場)

[chǎng] field, place where people gather, stage, level open ground, country fair, market, <classifier for games, performances etc.>

[cháng] <classifier for happenings>

住

[zhù] live (in a place)

笑

[xiào] laugh

华 (F 華)

[huá] glory, splendor, magnificent, (= 中华 Zhōnghuá) China

[huà] <family name>;

    华山 Huà Shān (mountain in Shanxi)

报 (F 報)

[bào] (= 报告 bàogào) report, (= 报纸 bàozhǐ) newspaper, (= 电报 diànbào) telegram
